description:
Use this rack to adjust the angle of your bike where it meets the wall, and make the most of your space.

  • Independent arms adjust in 2 dimensions
  • Soft rubber cradles protect frame’s finish
  • Screw into any standard wall stud
  • Mounting Area is 28.3 x 5.8cm
  • Cradle distance to wall is 203 to 305mm
  • Load capacity is 22.7kg
  • Dimensions are 47 x 10 x 8.3cm
name: Feedback Sports Velo Wallrack 2D
